snippet.title: THE HOUCHI PLAY
snippet.description: このゲームは主人公である平凡太郎を操作して、コスプレした女の子に気付かれる事無く接近するのが目的です。女の子が背中を向けている時が接近のチャンスです。 振り向く前にできるだけ接近しましょう。全てのレベルをクリアすると、女の子をギャラリーに登録する事も可能です。好みの女の子が見付かったら、どんどん挑戦しましょう。　The aim of this game is to maneuver Taro Heibon and get close to the cos-play girls without being noticed.  It's the right time to get close to them when they are facing away, so try to move closer before they face round. After passing all the stages, you can register the girls in your Gallery. Find the girls you like and make a move.

localized.title: THE HOUCHI PLAY

It's the right time to get close to them when they are facing away, so try to move closer before they face round. After passing all the stages, you can register the girls in your Gallery. Find the girls you like and make a move.
